content: This week, many people in the React community are at ReactEurope in the beautiful (and very warm) city of Paris, the second React conference that's been held to date. At our last conference, we released the first beta of React 0.13, and we figured we'd do the same today with our first beta of React 0.14, giving you something to play with if you're not at the conference or you're looking for something to do on the way home.
